column5: Just wondering if Lake Scugog in Port Perry has pike. If so what ideas do you have for pike fishing off the shore...not just at this lake at any lake ?
No pike in Scugog, at least not yet.
"No musky either  "   They will show up on Muskie opener
there is musky, walleye, bass, crappies, catfish, carp, you name it minus pike haha....there are no pike in the kawarthas
pike and musky dont get along well
ok, well any tips for OFF SHORE fishing for pike up north?

any old mepps spinner, or a spoon, senko, spinner bait, topwater lure, pike will eat anything i swear.....they are stupid lol throw a roller skate you'll probably end up getting a largemouth first but the pike will come next
canal  is loaded with pike and has a fair amount of musky also
